content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed that Mexico’s hydrocarbon regulator has fined state oil company Pemex for development violations at one of its most important fields that has led to excessive flaring of natural gas and is preparing another fine for a similar field. Pressure is mounting on Pemex to clean up its operations, but alleged failures at the two fields, both considered strategic priorities, have resulted in huge amounts of gas being burnt off or wasted despite a global push to reduce emissions.Â
